title: Research data quality: Task-input, WebFetch-input, WebSearch-input
description: Analyze samples of Task-input, WebFetch-input, WebSearch-input. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (Task-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'Task-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (Task-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (WebFetch-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'WebFetch-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (WebFetch-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (WebSearch-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'WebSearch-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (WebSearch-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
